snippet: The Russian president and President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner also discussed cooperation on military technology and satellites.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin and his Argentine counterpart Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner sign deals on nuclear energy and other projects in effort to expand Russia's influence in Latin America.
lead_paragraph: The Russian president and President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner also discussed cooperation on military technology and satellites.

headline.main: Putin and Argentine Leader Agree on Nuclear Power Project
headline.print_headline: Putin and Argentine Leader Agree on Nuclear Power Project
